      • startBattle

        public void startBattle(Player player,
                        NpcTrainer enemy,
                        boolean turboMode,
                        javafx.scene.layout.Pane teamBuilderPane)
        Starts battle in offline mode.
        Parameters:
        player - object representing the player trainer
        enemy - object representing the enemy trainer
        turboMode - enables turbo mode if true, otherwise disables it
        teamBuilderPane - the pane from which the game is started from

      • startOnlineBattle

        public void startOnlineBattle(Player player,
                              OnlineTrainer enemy,
                              boolean turboMode,
                              javafx.scene.layout.Pane teamBuilderPane,
                              Enums.GameMode gameMode,
                              java.io.DataInputStream inputStream,
                              java.io.DataOutputStream outputStream)
        Starts battle in online mode
        Parameters:
        player - object representing the player trainer
        enemy - object representing the enemy trainer
        turboMode - enables turbo mode if true, otherwise disables it
        teamBuilderPane - the pane from which the game is started from
        gameMode - game mode in which the game should be running (either client or server)
        inputStream - input stream connected to enemy player
        outputStream - output stream connected to enemy player

      • endOnlineGameDisconnected

        public void endOnlineGameDisconnected(boolean syncError)
        Ends battle if the game was unexpectedly disconnected or the state of the game is out of sync between players.
        Parameters:
        syncError - should be set to true if the cause of the disconnect is a sync error, false otherwise

      • processPlayerAction

        public void processPlayerAction(TrainerAction playerAction)
        Processes action taken by the player.
        Parameters:
        playerAction - action taken by the player; at this stage of the turn, this variable is only complete if the player decided to attack

      • waitEnemyAction

        public void waitEnemyAction(TrainerAction playerAction,
                            java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> battleTimeLine)
        If run in offline mode, this method returns the action generated by the AI trainer. In online mode however, this method starts a thread that swaps information with enemy player about each trainer's action.
        Parameters:
        playerAction - action taken by the player
        battleTimeLine - list containing all Timeline objects to be played during current turn

      • battleTurn

        public void battleTurn(@NotNull
                       TrainerAction playerAction,
                       @NotNull
                       TrainerAction enemyAction,
                       java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> battleTimeLine)
        Starts turn when all actions are decided by both trainers. Determines the action order of the turn. This method should be called only once per turn.
        Parameters:
        playerAction - action taken by the player
        enemyAction - action taken by the enemy
        battleTimeLine - list containing all Timeline objects to be played during current turn

      • processEnemySwitchOut

        public void processEnemySwitchOut(Pokemon firstPokemon,
                                  Pokemon secondPokemon,
                                  Move secondMove,
                                  Enums.SwitchContext switchContext,
                                  TrainerAction enemyAction)
        Handles when the enemy swaps Pok√©mon in the middle of a turn. This may be caused by moves that initiate a switch after executing or by the previous enemy Pok√©mon fainting.
        Parameters:
        firstPokemon - Pok√©mon that attacks first in this turn
        secondPokemon - Pok√©mon that attacks second in this turn
        secondMove - move selected by the second Pok√©mon's trainer in this turn
        switchContext - context behind the switch, this should be either a Pok√©mon fainting or a switch caused by a move
        enemyAction - action taken by the enemy; it should be a SWITCH_POKEMON action

      • battleTurnEnd

        public void battleTurnEnd(java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> battleTimeLine)
        Method executed that ends the move portion of the turn and starts checks related to conditions affecting Pok√©mon and the field.
        Parameters:
        battleTimeLine - list containing all Timeline objects to be played during current turn

      • finalChecks

        public void finalChecks(java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> battleTimeLine)
        Allows the player and the enemy to send out new Pokemon if necessary. If everything is in order, starts a new turn.
        Parameters:
        battleTimeLine - list containing all Timeline objects to be played during current turn

      • initAnimationQueue

        public void initAnimationQueue(java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> battleTimeLine)
        Initiates animation queue. This configures all Timeline objects to execute after the previous one is finished. The only objects exculded from this procedure are the ones with already defined onFinishedProperty()
        Parameters:
        battleTimeLine - list containing all Timeline objects to be played during current turn

      • switchPokemon

        public void switchPokemon(boolean ally,
                          int slot)
        Handles logic related to switching out a Pok√©mon.
        Parameters:
        ally - true if Pok√©mon to be switched out is an ally, false otherwise
        slot - slot number of Pok√©mon to be sent out.
